attributes.comment:
We are in the midst of adopting a child from China, and because of the recent
extended wait times we will need to refile our 1-600a and 1 171H petitions. What
this means to our family is that we had paid a fee of $545.00 plus fingerprinting
costs for both of us of $70.00 each. Now we hear that we will need to update this
information and pay these fees again which you are trying to raise the fees of up
to $670.00. This does not include the fees of updating our homestudy as well as
fingerprinting etc.too.
Please reconsider these charges for us Americans that are looking to expand our
families through adoption!!
Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By MaryAnn DeAlto
